description:
This complete Wordpress crash course teaches Wordpress beginners, whether it be someone who hasn't used Wordpress before or someone who just needs some extra help with Wordpress, how to use Wordpress to elevate their business or hobby. There are 8 modules comprising of 66 step-by-step video tutorials which will take you by the hand and ensure that you are a Wordpress wonder by the end of the course.

This course is meant for you to follow along with our videos and apply what you learned after each video so it should take a day or 2 to complete the course. You will have lifetime access to this course so you can always come back and learn if you forgot a stop so we like to consider it a lifetime of learning.

We recommend you take this course if you want to apply Wordpress into your online business or simply want to learn how to use it or if you want to just learn about some tips and tricks to enhance your already thriving Wordpress sites. Hope to see you as a student :)
title: How to Master Wordpress: For Beginners
